## KeyboardBindings type

A map of keyboard bindings and their corresponding command functions (a.k.a editing actions).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type KeyboardBindings<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> = Record<string, CommandFunction<GSchema>>;
```
